LanguageData.VFES_CavalrySpikes.label: cavalry spikes
LanguageData.VFES_CavalrySpikes.description: Wooden stakes placed in a row to build defensive fortifications. Very cheap and quick to build, provides basic cover and deals damage to people trying to traverse them. Breaks after some time.
LanguageData.VFES_CavalrySpikes_Blueprint.label: cavalry spikes (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFES_CavalrySpikes_Frame.label: cavalry spikes (building)
LanguageData.VFES_CavalrySpikes_Frame.description: Wooden stakes placed in a row to build defensive fortifications. Very cheap and quick to build, provides basic cover and deals damage to people trying to traverse them. Breaks after some time.
